issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
When I run the android emulator I have no problem , however I do not have Iphone emulators .
Any information will be helpful
fields.summary: [ERROR] :  There are no supported Xcode installations found.
fields.environment:
Titanium Command-Line Interface, CLI version 3.4.0, Titanium SDK version 3.4.0.GA
[ERROR] :  There are no supported Xcode installations found.

Operating System: 10.9.5 mavericks
Titanium : 3.4.0 GA
XCode installed : Version 5.0 ( 5A1413 )
Previously installed XCode : 4.5

comments.body:
Hi,

The Titanium studio 3.4.0 is a release to support iOS 8 and so on, so you have to update your Xcode to 6 or above.

Regards,
Shuo
thanks for your help , I indicated and I can now run the emulator
